Thornton Tomlinson

  1. Foster Name: Floyd (Floid) T.
  2. Foster Family: Charles and Julia Browning
  3. Location of Family: Fairbury, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Fairbury, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 18 months
  7. Date of Birth: 3/26/1905, New Rochelle, NY
  8. Date of Death: 11/5/1982, Vancouver, WA
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Fairbury Gazette, 21 September 1906; Fairbury Gazette, 5 October 1906; 1910 United Stated Federal Census; OTR; National Orphan Train Complex; OTHSA Membership Directory.
